regen.new_specification: Continuous BIT, in conjunction with Redundancy Management and Scheduler operations running in the 50Hz rategroup after the application tasks, shall take less than 3 milliseconds when processing faults.

regen.absent_element: execution time constraint under fault conditions
regen.new_specification: Continuous BIT shall take less than 3 milliseconds when processing faults while integrated with Redundancy Management and Scheduler operations at 50Hz.

regen.absent_element: integration with Redundancy Management and Scheduler operations and execution time under fault conditions
regen.new_specification: Continuous BIT shall integrate with Redundancy Management and Scheduler operations and shall take less than 3 milliseconds when processing faults.

label: Continuous BIT shall take less than 3 milliseconds while processing faults.
